definitions.text: the act of passing from one state or place to the next
a section of text; particularly a section of medium length
a way through or along which someone or something may pass
the passing of a law by a legislative body
a short section of a musical composition
a path or channel or duct through or along which something may pass
a bodily reaction of changing from one place or stage to another
examples: the passage of air from the lungs

definitions.text: the motion of one object relative to another
examples: stellar passings can perturb the orbits of comets

definitions.text: the act of passing something to another person
